name: Endless Maze (Olayne)
description:
Rumor has it that this labyrinth is endless, but at level 100 you can find a hidden treasure.
_____________________

Wow !
Where I am ?
Why am I round and flat?
Oh, there is another circle ahead, probably he will tell me the way?!
...
No, no, no, he is not my friend, he turned red and ran after me as soon as he saw me, the red devil is faster than me ...

Oh no, I'm at a dead end, God, what to do?
Unidentified Person: "Jump!"
What?! Who are you?! Okay, whatever, I'm jumping.
Wow, I did it, I can jump!
Ha ha ha, stupid red circle, now you can't catch me.
...
No, no, no, it turned out he has friends, God, where should I run?
Unidentified Person: "Find a way out, it's in one of the corners"
...
Hooray, I see a way out, I escaped, ha ha ha, stupid red circles, goodbye...
...
Oh NOOO...
_____________________

Control
PC: wasd, space.
Phone: joystick to jump click on the right side of the screen.
